name: Banette
description: Resentment at being cast off made it spring into being. Some say that treating it well will satisfy it, and it will once more become a stuffed toy.

abilities.name: Curse of Devolution
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may devolve 1 of your opponent’s Benched evolved Pokémon by putting the highest Stage Evolution card on it into your opponent’s hand.
